channel.title: Homes on QUAN ZHENG
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on QUAN ZHENG

item.description: About Quan ZHENG is a postdoctoral researcher working with Prof. Matthias Zwicker at Department of Computer Science of University of Maryland, College Park (UMD). His research interests lie in visual computing, including efficient high-fidelity rendering, light transport simulation, imaging simulation, etc. Quan Zheng obtained his Ph.D. degree from Institute of Software of Chinese Academy of Sciences (ISCAS). His advisor was Prof. Changwen Zheng. In 2012, He received the B.S. degree in Computer Science from Dalian University of Technology (DUT).

item.title: Recent news
item.description: Feb. 2019: Research paper ‘Learning to importance sample in primary sample space’ is accepted to Eurographics 2019.
